title: Marine cargo insurance certificates
dataVerified: Shipper, consignee, cargo description, value, voyage details, insurer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Certificate status (active/cancelled). Link to insurer system (trade parties and authorized verifiers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake marine cargo insurance (enables shipping fraud). Domain binding verifies insurer. International trade requirement. High cargo values ($100K-$50M+). Letter of credit compliance.
